problem.markdown:
1. To expand the boundary of an object in binary images the appropriate operation is
( ) Erosion (x) Dilation ( ) Opening ( ) Closing
2. To eliminate the small holes in the binary images, the approriate operation is
( ) Erosion ( ) Dilation ( ) Opening (x) Closing
3. A binary image consists of disks of sizes 3,7,9,15,17 pixels. We want to remove all the disks of size less than 13 pixels. Which morphological opeartion perform the task?
( ) Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 15 (x) Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 13 ( ) Dilation with structuring element(disk) of size 15 ( ) Dilation with structuring element(disk) of size 13
4. Which morphological operation is used for smoothing the contour of an object in grayscale image
(x) Erosion ( ) Dilation ( ) Closing ( ) Opening
problem.p: 1. To expand the boundary of an object in binary images the appropriate operation is
2. To eliminate the small holes in the binary images, the approriate operation is
3. A binary image consists of disks of sizes 3,7,9,15,17 pixels. We want to remove all the disks of size less than 13 pixels. Which morphological opeartion perform the task?

choicegroup.choice: Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 15
Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 13
